Steps.Message: Update at 12:45 - We can confirm that all power in the RH13/RH14/RH20 area should be back on. Our engineers have now safely diverted power around the overhead network fault. We're sorry for the length of time you were without power; this is due to the amount of damage on our network caused by the high winds and heavy rain during storm Bella. If your power isn't back on, call us on 08003163105 free from landlines and mobiles.

We became aware of this power cut at 08:59. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut, but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly. Engineers in our control room have switched some customers power back on in your area. To get everyone’s power back on we may need to attend to investigate and make repairs. We’ll continue to update you until everyone’s power is back on.
Steps.Name: We are restoring customers automatically

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

Logs.Comment: Update at 12:45 - We can confirm that all power in the RH13/RH14/RH20 area should be back on. Our engineers have now safely diverted power around the overhead network fault. We're sorry for the length of time you were without power; this is due to the amount of damage on our network caused by the high winds and heavy rain during storm Bella. If your power isn't back on, call us on 08003163105 free from landlines and mobiles.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: Our engineers had to redirect power due to a fault on the electricity network.
